name: Cream Abdul Babar
description: '''Cream Abdul Babar''' is one of the longest-standing bands in the [[Tallahassee, Florida|Tallahassee]] scene. The band formed in 1994, combining elements of [[Punk rock|punk]], [[Heavy metal music|metal]], [[Industrial music|industrial]], and [[Noise music|noise]] to create their brand of [[experimental rock]]. The band's name is a play on [[Kareem Abdul-Jabbar]].
